ygData.subject: RE: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: First off, are you using the newer Luclin graphics? I m assuming you are. It only happens to your character or to everyone else you see as well? If it s only
ygData.messageBody:
First off, are you using the newer Luclin graphics? I'm assuming you are. It only happens to your character or to everyone else you see as well? If it's only happening to you try this:

Remove head gear/masks. Pick your desired features using the /face command. Force a character save. Zone into another area, still without head gear. Check yourself, you should be "yourself". If not...start over and try again. If you are okay, then you should be okay and can put back on head gear/masks. Remember, this is if it's happening to you only.

Let us know if this works.

If I'm totally misunderstanding what you meant, smack me upside the head and speak slowly. :p


Also a Rob :)

>> > > Hey Everybody,
>> > > I'm new to the list! I have a general question
>> that
>> > > hasen't been
>> > > answered for a few months now. I'm hoping one of
>> you
>> > > might know what
>> > > the heck is going on! Ok, so this is what's
>> > > happening;
>> > > Whenever I zone my characters face will
>> change!?!?!
>> > > I'm thinking it
>> > > has something to do with low memory but I have
>> about
>> > > 500mb of ram.
>> > > And I'm not too keen on computers so if there is
>> > > another form of
>> > > memory that could be lacking please enlighten
>> me!
>> > > This stupid problem
>> > > has coused me to quit playing for awhile. It
>> makes
>> > > me sooo mad!!!!
>> > > Sincerely,
>> > > Deidre
>> > >
